title: Repealing a punishment
body:

While I admit I lost control at points and resorted the term braindead, I've witnessed much worse toxicity going unpunished, and i find it highly unfair, that while the troll gets away unpunished, I lose my honor level and get chat banned, just becuase the number of players supporting singed outnumbers me.

I'm hoping that at least this case is reviewed, as I find this punishment very unjust, as singed walks away scott-free.

replies.body:
You can file a support ticket. I've seen a lot milder language get punished though.

Riot won't tell you if someone else gets punished.

> [{quoted}](name=FailedAbortion,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=G3blXFgp,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-17T00:09:32.034+0000)
>
> You can file a support ticket. I've seen a lot milder language get punished though.
> 
> Riot won't tell you if someone else gets punished.

I wouldn't bother. These logs are toxic, it's only a chat ban, and it doesn't help that he topped it off with "inting again". That line alone should get you punished. (Unless it's a joke in the context of the game and a Rioter can review it and see that)
When I said inting again, I was referring to the lee that took every q, but I guess that's not exactly intentional "feeding" but still

Next time just accept the game is over and do you best to make the poor troll miserable by playing his own game better than him. And stay silent - dont accuse them, just accept them.

Either way everyone on your team is fucked, at least you can all go down laughing.

In that case, you could have:

* Taken lee's camps

* Updated the other team on the position of lee/singed using nicely vague wording

* Followed singed as he proxyfarms and try to take as many minions as you can - this seems to always end with the guy raging and running into a turret before AFKing.

* Play river shen - just run around ganking every single lane without farming.
I was scared I would get an actual ban if I trolled him back...
